subject: Baseball
Boxing
lead_paragraph: A film, in public view for the first time, captures the day an animated Lou Gehrig sparred with Jack Dempsey in a staged workout at Artie McGovern’s gym in 1935.
snippet: A film, in public view for the first time, captures the day an animated Lou Gehrig sparred with Jack Dempsey in a staged workout at Artie McGovern’s gym in 1935.
